tldr: Affected versions of the package expose sensitive information to unauthorized actors by adding un-obfuscated data to the session trace in several locations.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@newrelic/browser-agent` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor
